title: Union loses legal challenge in Patel bullying case
content: Boris Johnson kept his home secretary in place, saying she had not broken ministerial rules.

title: We'll tackle 300,000 problem drug users, PM says
content: A new drug strategy will mean more funding for treatment and a crackdown on gangs, ministers say.

title: National review launched after Arthur murder
content: Lessons will be learnt to protect other children from such evil crimes, the government says.

title: Parliament drug use claims to be raised with police
content: Commons Speaker Sir Lindsay Hoyle says allegations of cocaine taking are "deeply concerning".

title: Navy rape complainant backs civilian court trials
content: The woman says there were serious failings in the handling of her rape case by a military court.

title: Online Safety Bill : What to expect
content: Politicians are due to give their recommendations for the landmark piece of legislation.

title: Signing of Anglo-Irish Treaty marked 100 years on
content: The treaty created an independent Irish Free State but led to the Irish Civil War.
